reviews.review: OMG... This is some of the best if not the best gaming experience I have ever had. The visuals are stunning. The story is amazing. Which all together makes a griddy realistic approach to city 17. This game is the closest game to perfection since... I don't know ever? Anyway the way the original revolutionized the FPS industry like doom and quake. This one shall do it again. I am ready for the 3... BUY IT ALREADY.

The Valve Masterpiece.

The half life story continues. You play as the silent protagonist Gordon Freeman popularly known as the Freeman. Brought back from cryo sleep by the mysterious G-Man.

So I was playing this and I beat the shit out of aliens with a crowbar and then killed an enemy soldier by throwing a toilet at him with the awesome zero point field manipulator (the "Gravity gun" LOL); 

The game is set across a very beautiful set of maps waiting to be feasted upon by your eyes.

Don't think, just get it.

10/10

With its story driven drama and shooter mechanics it makes the game a hell of a time. Sometimes wondering wrather your safe or someone is watching over you at all times. Be warned there is 3 expansion packs for this game each costing 8 dollars but the third one costs $40 i have no idea why but don't buy it i don't even know why it exist. Ive bought it and played it and its not good and extremely buggy i would even say some mods out there are better than this. But the other 2 DLCs are a good game in and of itself, They actually follow the storyline!
In the end i would give this game a 10/10
Its a GET THIS GAME RIGHT THE F*CK NOW!
So, i'm playing this in 2014, 10 years after the releasing of this game and it's still better than some games i'm seeing these days.. really cool

Half life 2 skvělé pokračování  předešlého dílu objevuje se tu výjmečně skvělá společnice alyx která ti ze vším pomůže. grafika úžasná a to zpracováni a  chování nepřátelských inteligencí skvělé  prostě stojí za to si ji pořídit :)

Mejor shooter al que he jugado. Gran historia, genial gameplay y geniales gráficos para un juego de hace 10 años.
No hay nada malo que decir de este juego. En mi opinión, es el mejor juego que han sacado en la última década. Es simplemente perfecto.
Se lo recomiendo a todo el mundo.
C'est un très bon jeu

ストーリーが一番重要だと思う人にとっては最高の作品だと思います。
豊富な武器、敵、どれをとっても文句なしだと思います。
難易度もバランスよく設定されており、詰んだときのため（？）に難易度が途中で変更可能になっています。
youtubeなどの動画サイトにこの作品のパロディーみたいなのが何個も流れていますがなぜそんなに人気なのかはプレイすればすぐにわかると思います。
この人気からかHalf-life3をいますぐ出せというユーザーも・・・
私もHalf-life3を早くだしてほしいと思っていますが未定のようですね、しかし私はいつまでも待ち続けます。

Não sou fã do genero fps, acho que foram poucos títulos que eu acabei gostando, mas esse half life me surpreendeu demais, que jogão, jogabilidade sem igual, gráficos bons para a época e sem contar na história totalmente envolvente, RECOMENDADÍSSIMO!

I'm not too sure why but this game is just so heavy on me. I can't bring myself to play this for more than an hour a day, however, that doesn't mean this game is bad. Oh, hell, no! This game is very, very, very good. It's superb! You must play through it at least once in your life.

Nuevamente debo decir:"woaaa". Es primera vez que juego el half-life 2(2014) y debo decir que es un juego increíble. Contextualizando que es del 2004, las gráficas son estupendas, las texturas increíbles, la jugabilidad impresionante. Una obra excelente que ha envejecido muy bien. Muy buen juego al gran nivel que también tuvo half-life. De verdad espero que salga pronto hl3.

Since Half life 2 is coming up on it's 10th anniversary. (Yikes) I figure I would review this legendary game since I never have.
Half life 1 and 2 aren't just games, They're a work of art. A masterpiece, a unforgettable epitome of a fantastic video game. An unbreakable community of passionate gamers. Half life games are something that resonate with you like nothing else. They aren't just play it once, have decent fun, and never touch it again. The atmosphere and believability is insane. Even 10-16 years later, people still talk about Half life 1 and Half life 2 as if they came out yesterday.﻿ That's how much of an impact these games had on the industry. I would recommend this to everyone, at least try both games once in your lifetime.
What are you doing reading this review? Seriously just buy this game. Still reading this far? For half life 2's sake just buy this game. It's going to be the best thing that you've ever done!

In this game you play as Morgan Freeman who is helped by Bill Cosbys daughter.

You shoot aliens and people and alien people.


Sometimes both.

10/10

Half-Life 2 is the game everyone loves to talk about.  While the gameplay is enjoyable and plot thick, the fans are a bit... Insane.
Basically, buy it and stay away from the 3 deprived.

THE best FPS. A pretty good story, a gun which can just pick up random things and fire it, and some wonderful sections where you get a break from plain shooting and get to use interesting vehicles, as well as pretty good graphics which run well on even fairly weak computers. What a game.
The same great FPS as it's predecessor, now with more gravity.  This game had it all, graphics, story, sound, and then seamlessly impliment puzzle parts added with the gravity gun.

This game created trend in the whole game industry in my opinion as I see its echoes reflected in almost every game I played. The plot and ingame activity makes you fully immersed into it, which makes HL2 unique one and not just an ordinary shooter where you get completely bored by shooting bad guys or things. You are not a gamer if yo have not tried HL2. 100% recommend to all!!!

This game made me hate ladders. 8.5/10.

On a more serious note, this game has amazing features. Many are creative, making use of the [spoiler]Pheropods[/spoiler] to command the Antlions is really original. There are many other examples but I don't want to spoil the game too much for you.

The only thing I really don't like too much is the physics engine. It doesn't work too well. Quite ironic, since HƛLF-LIFE is supposed to be a physics series. Ladders don't work well either. You have no idea how many times I have died from a major fracture. Thanks, HEV suit!

This is without a doubt one of the best games ever made! The story is just brilliant. It's a lot deeper than the first Half-Life's story. The gameplay is remarkable and there is a large variety of things you can do in this game. There are so many fun and compelling chapters in this game that just leave you with your jaw dropped. After the game is completed, it still feels like something is missing and it will leave you thirsting for more. This game felt really quick to beat in my opinion and the first Half-Life felt like an eternity. This game is a must have for your steam library and it's 10 times better than the first Half-Life. I give it a 10/10!

Gra troszkę nudnawa na początku, ale po jakichś 5 godzinach się rozkręca. Wiele postaci, które zapadają w pamięć, świetny soundtrack i fenomenalna fabuła. Jedną z najważniejszych rzeczy w tej grze jest sam silnik, który do dzisiaj jest wykorzystywany przez Valve.
Plusy:
[list]
[*]fabuła
[*]zapadające w pamięć postacie
[*]świetny silnik
[*]świetny soundtrack
[*]wiele broni 
[*]dobra grafika, nawet jak na dzisiejsze czasy
[*]grywalność
[/list]
Minusy:
[list]
[*]nudna na początku
[*]trochę krótka. bo zajmuje do 15 h
[*]pomiędzy "bazami" ruchu oporu można wpaść w monotonie
[*]sekwencje z pojazdami są okropnie słabe
[/list]
Podsumowując: 
Jest to fps ze świetną fabułą i grywalnością, dla ludzi, którzy lubią chodzić z punktu A do B eliminując po drodze przeciwników. Pod koniec zdecydowanie czuć niedosyt. 
9-/10
Игра века. И этим все сказано.

Отличная, а главное с хорошей графикой игра.Часто есть заворушки,а также экстремальные ситуации,сюжет,музыка.Отличное управление,Возможно все уже ждут 3-ю часть игры.Пока мы можешь сказать только это.Понимаю этот коммментарий мал, но много еще можно сказать об этой игре.
Это лучшая игра всех времен. И пускай она уже не новая - она дала жизнь новому взгляду на игровую индустрию
Half Life 2.

Half-Life 2: What does it have to offer?

Let's see: We get a Crowbar, Unique Enemies, Amazing Story, Crowbar, Funny Sayings, Boxes, Crowbar, Crowbar, Head Humpers, Crowbar, Amazing scenery, Good "Supportive" Characters, Crowbar, the Mysterious G-Man, Crowbar, and above all: A huge cliff hanger.

I really do recommend this game. It's fun, it's elusive, thought-boggiling, action-y, unique, and above all: Crowbar Approved. 8.5/10, amazing game, really love it. Thanks for reading this.


























































Crowbar.

Half-Life 2 is a great game with an amazing story. Continue the story of Dr. Gordon Freeman as he is brought back by G-Man to fight the Combine and set humanity free. Amazing story, gameplay and characters. With the only downside of being a little bit linear, yet exploration is rewarded by Lambda locations or unexpected sights and characters, and also some annoying loading screens at unexpected parts. It's an incredible game that no first-person shooter fan should miss.

IMHO= 9/10 A must buy!
Great Story, visuals, voices, its half life, is it possible to say anything bad about it?

Jogo épico! historia ótima , grafico razoavel pra bom e EXTREMAMENTE leve!
O jogo faz a continuação de Half Life 1, onde Gordon Freeman ( protagonista) , um jovem cientista volta para a terra em um lugar chamado City 17, vou evitar detalhes, pois não quero dar spoiler, mas cara, se eu fosse você sem sobra de duvidas eu ia comprar!
Otimo game, apesar de antigo é otimo!
Ótimo, recomendo a todos, muito viciante!

Well, I will say this is with out a doubt one of the best first person shooter games I have ever played. I am not just saying this because of the developers/publishers of this game happen to be the same ones who owned this gaming distrubution known as Steam. No, I really mean it. The way they do gameplay cutscenes in this game is excellent. There is barely anything linear in this game at all; I just wish more modern first person shooter would follow this format instead fo hours and hours of cutscenes to keep a story moving. The graphics of this game is still excellent after all these years. 

Finally Thoughts
A must buy for people who love first person shooters.
Probably one, if not the, best FPS games ever. I'll never shake the feeling of beating this game.

Damals war es was besonderes und heute immernoch.

Um excelente jogo que revolucionou o mundo dos games. Embora seja antigo, não deixa nada a desejar para muitos jogos da atualidade. 
O jogo conta com uma maravilhosa história, gráficos incríveis, jogabilidade perfeita e uma vasta coletânea de armas.

Perfeito para garantir várias horas de diversão, simplesmente vale muito a pena.
Grande enredo! Você se sente lendo uma distopia fantástica. Simplesmente incrível!

Vážně skvělá hra! Poprvé jsem ji hrál před 6 lety a hned mě ten pžíběh vtáhl a nepustil! :) O ostatních epizodách jsem se dozvěděl teda až za 2 roky potom co jsem hl2 dohrál, ale můžu říct jen jedno.. Good work Valve! we enjoy to next amazing part.
Довольно итересный подход разрабов. Как только нам надоедает бродить по уровням и решать головоломки, то сразу на смену этому мчится экшен на транспортном средстве. Получилось довольно круто.

Честно говоря... я не знаю, что мне сказать. Я не знаю, что я могу рассказать об этой игре своим друзьям, знакомым, незнакомцу из интернета. Я видел большие рецензии, полные бурных впечатлений - положительных, отрицательных, абсолютно разных. Видел рецензии, наполненные объективизмом, серьёзным подходом к делу и тщательным рассмотрением каждой детали. Я не могу написать ни одну из них. Возможно мог бы, но понимаете ли...

Это неописуемо. Если и существует способ описания игр Valve, то он находится где-то рядом со словом "Идеально".
Читая один из обзоров на Portal 2 я наткнулся на такую фразу: "Portal 1 был идеален. Portal 2 является нечто большим. Он - человечный." Так чем же тогда является Half-Life 2? 

Наверное чем-то большим, чем "человечный", если следовать по цепочке. Чем-то, что создаётся человеком, воспроизводится в мозгу, но зачастую не может быть тем же самым мозгом описано.

Как сказал Доктор Брин: "Наш язык слишком примитивен, чтобы описать такие вещи". Или как-то так.
 Но мы все можем их испытать на себе, прочувствовать, быть частью этого. Чего я вам и желаю.

Спасибо за внимание.

A very solid game.  Storyline is good, and the gun-fights that take place are very exciting.  Many eerie and creepy moments, like crawling through pitch-black vents, or watching as a headcrab latches onto someone.  Overall, I really liked this game.  It really made me think and I got stuck at many points in this terrific fps game.
